description: A Gear Second technique where Luffy launches a rapid-fire barrage of hundreds of punches at extreme speed, combining the power of Gatling with the enhanced speed of Gear Second.

keyMoments.title: First Use Against Rob Lucci
keyMoments.description: Luffy uses Gomu Gomu no Jet Gatling for the first time to defeat Rob Lucci, overwhelming his Tekkai defense and sending him crashing through the tower wall.
keyMoments.significance: Debuts one of Luffy's most powerful and iconic finishing moves.
keyMoments.effectiveness: Completely overwhelming against Lucci's strongest defense

description: An enhanced version of Rokuogan used by Rob Lucci in his Human-Beast Form. He wraps his tail around the target to restrain them, then performs Rokuogan with enlarged leopard fists, creating a larger attack radius and greater attack power than the standard version.

keyMoments.title: Ultimate Attack Against Luffy
keyMoments.description: Rob Lucci uses his ultimate technique against Luffy, restraining him with his tail and delivering the most powerful Rokuogan variation.
keyMoments.significance: Represents the peak of Lucci's Rokushiki mastery and his strongest attack.
keyMoments.effectiveness: Devastating attack that would defeat most opponents, but Luffy's willpower allows him to survive

description: Franky uses his powerful mechanical arms to deliver a devastating hammer-like strike with tremendous force.

keyMoments.title: Defeats Very Good
keyMoments.description: Franky uses Strong Hammer to defeat Marine Captain Very Good, shattering his berry-form body.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Franky's ability to overcome Devil Fruit defensive abilities with raw power.
keyMoments.effectiveness: Successfully defeats a Devil Fruit user

name.romanized: Sabi Sabi no Mi no Chikara

description: The ability to rust any metal object on contact, causing weapons and metal items to corrode and crumble instantly. In anime-exclusive content, can also rust organic material.

keyMoments.title: Destroys Yubashiri
keyMoments.description: Shu uses his rust power to completely destroy Zoro's sword Yubashiri, turning it to dust.
keyMoments.significance: Successfully destroys one of Zoro's prized swords, demonstrating the devastating effectiveness against metal weapons.
keyMoments.effectiveness: Instantly destroys a Skillful Grade sword

weaknesses: Only affects metal (or organic in anime)

name.romanized: Beri Beri no Mi no Chikara

description: The ability to separate the body into multiple berry-shaped orbs, making the user immune to blunt attacks and allowing them to reform their body at will.

keyMoments.title: Used Against Franky
keyMoments.description: Very Good uses his Berry-Berry powers to separate his body to avoid damage from Franky's attacks.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the defensive capabilities of the Beri Beri no Mi.
keyMoments.effectiveness: Provides immunity to blunt attacks but can be overcome by sufficient force

weaknesses: Can be overcome by overwhelming force
counters: Strong Hammer and similar powerful attacks
